page.title: 18Interesting People
page.content: {Mr.Lennox }has been landlord at Downton for 15 years. He started farming in 1964 but he didn't own the estate then. It was given to him by his grandfather because his father had been killed in World War 2. His grandfather had inherited the estate in 1947. Mr.Lennox originally lived in Downton Castle but sold it in 1977 and moved to the pools farm. {Lord Cross. }Lord and Lady Cross live at Bridge House Leintwardine. Lord Cross is 80. He left London when he was 72 because Lady Cross wanted to live in the country. Lord Cross was a barrister for 30 years and a judge for the 15 years he only wears his ermine and scarlet robes for the state opening of Parliament. Nobody else in his family is a Lord but his brother was Sir Rupert Cross before he died.
